Craft an item of type: warped_fungus_on_a_stick
inventory=[{"type": "sponge", "quantity": 15, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 43, "index": 17}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 24}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 22, "index": 26}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft warped_fungus_on_a_stick, I need to place fishing_rod in slot 1 and warped_fungus in slot 3. Therefore I will first move the fishing_rod from slot 15 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Next I will move the warped_fungus from slot 33 to slot 5.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 5 with quantity 1

thought: Now I can craft the warped_fungus_on_a_stick by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
